name: The Shattered Blade
description:
The Shattered Blade is a dash based platformer. In this game you will control a very fast character,fly like thunder,and enjoy the feeling of challenge yourself.
Use your sword to dash and attack in this deadly neon world!

GameFeature

  • 1.Neon,Geometry Graphics.
  • 2.Super strong,instant feedback.
  • 3.Everything is very fast but controllable.
  • 4.Every level is brand new experience!New skills,new enemies,new difficulties,etc.
  • 5.Exciting music made by “弹跳的大球”.
  • 6.Every Enemies and Traps is made to be very interactive,scary and deadly.
  • 7.Level Editor!(in the future.)
